title: New Dan Brown font
content:
Is it possible to identify which font this is on the following page:

[http://www.thelostsymbol.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307112628/http:/www.thelostsymbol.com/)

Thanks for your help!  
Artifice
author: artifice

comments.content:
Definitely Trajan. The main title is photoshopped with a bevel & woodgrain, of course.

Why, if Adobe had a nickel for every time Trajan was used... oh wait, they DO!
